summary: Andres Janes is a seasoned Senior Software Engineer with over a decade of experience delivering sophisticated web applications, currently contributing to Cision's media monitoring platform. His deep expertise in Vue.js and TypeScript, combined with a proven track record of leading frontend initiatives—including championing Vue adoption across organizations and shipping production webRTC applications—positions him as a highly capable technical leader. Known for his pragmatic problem-solving approach and ability to thrive in remote, agile environments, Andres brings both technical excellence and collaborative professionalism that colleagues consistently praise for its calm, solution-oriented nature.
